name: Bungee Jumping Simulator (itch)
description:
"Bungee jumping simulator" is a single player game. You are helping on a Bungee jumping site. Your job is to pick rope with correct length and elasticity for the animal who jumps, based on the jump height and weight of the animal. 

This game was created during 'GAMEHIGHED Jam 2021' in 48 hours. 
Theme of the Game Jam: YOLO (You Only Live Once).
